## Bio

Andrew Tredennick confronts dynamic models with data to explore, predict, and understand.
He is currently a Senior Scientist at Metrum Research Group, using mechanistic models and state-of-the-art statistical approaches to accelerate the drug development process.
Andrew has completed projects on early warning signals for disease re-emergence and forecasting models of emerging infectious diseases, like COVID-19.
He works from home in beautiful Laramie, Wyoming.
